about_the_game:
The year is 2038. As terrorism becomes the world's greatest threat, governments prove ineffective. At the Global Council, Creed announces the creation of an independent organization named Liberty Force to combat terrorism. Liberty Force quickly grows stronger and carries out successful operations. However, to be more effective in the fight against terrorism, Creed forms an elite team called V.O.L.T (Vigilante Operation Lightning Team) made up of his best soldiers. V.O.L.T will now be humanity's greatest weapon against terrorism.

V.O.L.T launches with two major multiplayer game modes:

Conquest: A mode where two large teams compete to capture and hold specific areas on a massive battlefield. In addition to the 120 vs 120 massive mode, where you can battle using tanks, helicopters, jets, and ground vehicles, there are also smaller maps featuring 60 vs 60 and 30 vs 30 player modes.

Deathmatch: Compete solo against other players and fight to kill. Show your combat skills without using character abilities.

DISCOVER V.O.L.T'S ELITE CREW

Choose from specialists with unique active and passive abilities within different classes that define your role in battle, and make the war even more epic.

FIGHT TOGETHER

Individual effort alone won't be enough in battle; you need teammates who will watch your back and cooperate with you. Fight alongside your team.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR COMBAT STYLE

Adjust your attachments and customize your weapons to match your combat style. Save your customized loadouts and express your own style.

DESTROY ENEMIES WITH WAR MACHINES

Tanks that bring chaos to the battlefield, helicopters soaring like vultures, death-dealing jets from the skies, and more destruction await you. Feel the impact of battle with destructible buildings and structures.

content_descriptors.notes: The game showcase a war between invaders and defending heroes. There might be a bit of blood VFX that are mostly tooney.

detailed_description:
The year is 2038. As terrorism becomes the world's greatest threat, governments prove ineffective. At the Global Council, Creed announces the creation of an independent organization named Liberty Force to combat terrorism. Liberty Force quickly grows stronger and carries out successful operations. However, to be more effective in the fight against terrorism, Creed forms an elite team called V.O.L.T (Vigilante Operation Lightning Team) made up of his best soldiers. V.O.L.T will now be humanity's greatest weapon against terrorism.

V.O.L.T launches with two major multiplayer game modes:

Conquest: A mode where two large teams compete to capture and hold specific areas on a massive battlefield. In addition to the 120 vs 120 massive mode, where you can battle using tanks, helicopters, jets, and ground vehicles, there are also smaller maps featuring 60 vs 60 and 30 vs 30 player modes.

Deathmatch: Compete solo against other players and fight to kill. Show your combat skills without using character abilities.

name: V.O.L.T

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hadron HD2202
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen X 9600
  • Graphics: RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hadron HD2202

short_description: V.O.L.T is a massively multiplayer first-person shooter. Battle in massive player-versus-player wars with hero marksmen from different classes. Capture areas on the battlefield and survive. Experience this epic battle now.
